name: Out of Order (itch)
description:
Roam and jump around the surface of tiny planets on a quest for the resources needed to repair your space rocket. 

May contain a jetpack.

Controls :

- Arrow keys to move forwards/back and to turn around
- Space to jump
- C to interact

Credit where it's due :

- The font used in the game is Conthrax by Typodermic Fonts http://typodermicfonts.com/conthrax/
- Music tracks were based on a suggestion by http://tones.wolfram.com

Made within 7 days for Blackthornprod Game Jam #2
